(:action process_coconut
    :parameters (?p - person ?c - coconut ?t - tool ?r - rack ?g - glass)
    :precondition (and 
                    (available ?p)
                    (or (wrapped ?c) (has_casing ?c) (on ?c ?r) (not (drained ?c)) (broken ?c))
                    (or (knife ?t) (sharp ?t) (tool ?t))
                    (or (empty ?g) (not (empty ?g)))
                  )
    :effect (and 
              (or (peeled ?c) (not (wrapped ?c))

(:action break ; Break an object and update its state
  :parameters (?p - person ?obj - object ?tool - tool)
  :precondition (and 
                  (not (broken ?obj))
                  (in_hand ?tool)
                )
  :effect (and 
            (broken ?obj)
            (not (wrapped ?obj))
